caption: Deploy ERC-721 Drop
doc: Deploy a ERC-721 NFT drop contract.

AKl.caption: Name
AKl.doc: The name of this ERC-721 drop smart contract. This will be visible when viewing this NFT collection on NFT marketplaces such as OpenSea or Rarible.
AKl.name: name

AKm.caption: Image
AKm.doc: The image of this ERC-721 drop smart contract. This will be visible when viewing this NFT collection on NFT marketplaces such as OpenSea or Rarible. This can be the value of a image uploader or an IPFS links formatted: ipfs://<CID>
AKm.name: image

AKn.caption: Description
AKn.doc: The description of this ERC-721 smart contract. This will be visible when viewing this NFT collection on NFT marketplaces such as OpenSea or Rarible. of this ERC-721 drop smart contract. This will only be visible when viewing this NFT collection on NFT marketplaces such as OpenSea or Rarible.
AKn.name: description

AKo.caption: Symbol
AKo.doc: The symbol of this ERC-721 smart contract. This will only be visible when viewing this ERC-721 drop smart contract on a block explorer.
AKo.name: symbol

AKp.caption: Primary Sale Recipient
AKp.doc: The wallet address that will receive the funds generated from the initial sale of NFTs minted from this smart contract.
AKp.name: primary_sale_recipient

AKq.caption: Royalty Percentage
AKq.doc: Optional: The percentage in basis points of secondary sales on NFTs minted from the market place that will be sent to the royalty fee recipient.
AKq.name: seller_fee_basis_points

AKr.caption: Royalty Fee Recipient
AKr.doc: Optional: The wallet address that will receive the funds generated from secondary sales of NFTs minted from this smart contract.
AKr.name: fee_recipient
